name: Rapsodie
storyline:
Congratulations! You are now the manager of your own rap label. Recruit your first 6 artists from your top Spotify or Apple Music streams, and send them into battle against other players.

Collect daily revenue based on their real-life performances, and use that money to build a better and larger deck of cards from a selection of thousands of artists.

Improve your artists' stats with daily quests and win against other label managers in battle. your adventure starts now!
summary:
RAPSODIE is a strategic card game that allows you to create your own rap music label with a deck based on your favorite artists.

Sign your favorite artists, discover the talents of tomorrow, face off against other players in very short and wild duels !
